DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare performance Cypher sirolimus-eluting Taxus paclitaxel-eluting stent system prospective , multi-center , randomized clinical study .
DOC.brief_title: The REALITY Study - Head-to-Head Comparison Between Cypher Taxus
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize study conduct 90 center Europe , Latin-America Asia . A total 1335 patient enter study randomize 1:1 basis either sirolimus-eluting paclitaxel-eluting stent system . All patient repeat angiography eight month follow 24 month post-procedure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis angina pectoris define Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification ( CCS I , II , III , IV ) OR unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald Classification B & C , IIIIII ) OR patient document silent ischemia ; 2 . Treatment two de novo native coronary artery lesion maximum two major coronary artery ; 3 . Ostial lesion ; 4 . Bifurcations ; 5 . Target vessel diameter lesion must > =2.25mm < =3.0mm diameter ( visual estimate ) ; 6 . One target lesion must least 15 mm length second lesion least 10 mm length upper limit either ; 7 . Target lesion stenosis lesion > 50 % < 100 % ( visual estimate ) . 1 . Patient experience Qwave nonQwave myocardial infarction document total CK > 2 time normal within precede 72 hour CK CKMB enzymes remain normal time treatment ; 2 . Has unstable angina classify Braunwald A IIIIII ; 3 . Any lesion unprotected leave main coronary disease > =50 % stenosis ; 4 . Angiographic evidence thrombus within target lesion ; 5 . Heavily calcified lesion and/or calcify lesion , successfully predilated ( applies lesion ) ; 6 . Documented leave ventricular ejection fraction < =25 % ; 8 . Totally occluded vessel ( TIMI 0 level ) ( applies lesion ) ; 9 . Prior stent within 10mm target lesion ( applies lesion ) .
